meanings.definition: Not subject to debate or dispute.
meanings.sent1: The fact that the sun rises every morning is undebated.
meanings.sent2: The undebated decision was accepted by everyone without question.
meanings.sent3: It was undebated that ice cream is the best dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her talent was undebated, shining brighter than any other.
meanings.sent5: The undebated beauty of the sunset left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The undebated topic was quickly moved on from in the meeting.
meanings.sent2: His undebated absence from the party was noticed by all.
meanings.sent3: The undebated rule of no running in the hallway was broken by the students.
meanings.sent4: The undebated truth finally came to light, surprising many.
meanings.sent5: The undebated decision to cancel the event disappointed many attendees.
